comment: The polling numbers for Ellison must really be in the tank for the Dems to ask for an investigation into their Attorney General candidate's domestic abuse allegations. One has to wonder if the Minneapolis Police Union will be conducting the investigation for them or ?

(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG1 (n / number
                  :quant-of (p / poll-01

                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Ellison"))))
            :ARG2 (a / ask-02
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (p4 / political-party
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Democrat"))))
                  :ARG1 (ii / investigate-01
                        :ARG0 p3
                        :ARG1 (a2 / allege-01
                              :ARG0 (c / candidate
                                    :mod (a3 / attorney
                                          :mod (g / general))
                                    :poss p3)
                              :ARG1 (a4 / abuse-01
                                    :ARG0 c
                                    :mod (d / domestic)))))
            :ARG1-of (r / real-04)
            :snt2-of m)
      :ARG1 (o2 / one)
      :ARG2 (w / wonder-01
            :ARG0 o2
            :ARG1 (a5 / amr-choice
                  :op1 (c2 / conduct-01
                        :ARG0 (o3 / organization

                                    :op1 "Minneapolis"
                                    :op2 "Police"
                                    :op3 "Union"))
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / investigate-01
                              :ARG0 o3
                              :ARG1 p3))
                  :op2 (c3 / conduct-01
                        :ARG0 o3
                        :ARG1 ii2))))
